duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage maintenance employees and oversee automated technology.
Troubleshoot problems with Human-Machine Interface and Programmable Logic Controllers.
Maintain employee relations and evaluate job performance.
Make repairs using a Business Planning and Control System.
Follow company safety guidelines and Good Manufacturing Practices.
Ensure regular attendance and punctuality due to working with people, items, and equipment that are at the facility.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Maintenance Engineering or relevant field (Master's preferred)
